abstract: Weinstein Company says it won't film movie Richard Pryor: Is it Something I Said? in Georgia if Gov Nathan Deal signs Free Exercise Protection Act, law some say would lead to anti-gay discrimination.
lead_paragraph: Weinstein said it would cancel plans to film a Lee Daniels movie there after the Assembly passed a bill that some say would lead to discrimination.

headline.main: Weinstein Company Opposes Bill on Religion in Georgia
headline.print_headline: Weinstein Company Wary of Georgia Legislation

snippet: Weinstein said it would cancel plans to film a Lee Daniels movie there after the Assembly passed a bill that some say would lead to discrimination.
